author: philip
msg: Reintegrate the multi-layer-move branch.  This stores NODES.moved_to
in WORKING nodes and will break any working copy moves recorded by
older 1.8 clients transforming the moves into copies+deletes.

author: rbowen
msg: In the docs project, we just keep a STATUS file over in trunk. Removing
the STATUS file in 2.4 before it drifts out of date.
